LanguageData.USAC_Bond_Desc: A special paper certificate made from high-tenacity fibers, issued by USAC corporate distributors when trading with surface factions. The surface is printed with special ink, featuring elegant anti-counterfeiting marks and registered owner information.\n\nAfter goods are purchased and equipment is sold, the remaining value can be used to purchase these fixed-value certificates for use in the next transaction. Since the certificate is registered, it cannot be used by anyone other than the registered owner, making it practically worthless to other factions on the rimworld.
LanguageData.USAC_Currency_Desc: The total currency value for trading with USAC merchants. Includes corpse bag value and credit bond value. USAC traders only accept corpse bags and credit bonds as currency.\n\nBonds are consumed first. When bonds run out, corpse bags are consumed starting from the lowest value.
